Tests exception message contains stack with correct function name.

foo.displayName @ function-name-in-con…k.js@evaluation0:13
bar.displayName @ function-name-in-con…k.js@evaluation0:21
baz.function.name @ function-name-in-con…k.js@evaluation0:28

(anonymous) @ function-name-in-con…k.js@evaluation1:35
